title: Izinto Cross Platform Ecommerce App
description: This project enables Izinto to reach tens of thousands of cross-platform mobile users across South Africa to book home-care and errand service providers. The Izinto Mobile App provides users with real-time communication with local professional home-care services and is one of the top home services platforms in South Africa.
roleDescription: Spearheaded the end-to-end development of the Izinto Cross-Platform Ecommerce App, leveraging Flutter to create a seamless user experience across iOS and Android devices. Implemented robust features including real-time service booking, secure payment gateways, and user-friendly interfaces, resulting in a seamless customer engagement process.
